attributes.action: Supply Covid-19 vaccinations for British citizens living overseas
attributes.additional_details: Currently there can be difficulties for British citizens based overseas in accessing their resident country's covid-19 vaccination programme, which is detrimental to the individual's health and wellbeing.
attributes.background: Provide a way for British citizens living overseas to access Covid-19 vaccinations procured by the UK Government, for example via British embassies and consulates.
